get.description: Get strikes of a specific user.

clear.description: Clear all strikes of a specific user.

params.user: The user whose strikes will be cleared.

add_action.description: Add an additional action for a strike level.

params.number_of_strikes: Number of strikes required to trigger the action.
params.duration: Duration (only for timeout, e.g., 1h, 30m). Leave empty otherwise.

remove_action.description: Remove an action from a strike level.

params.number_of_strikes: Number of strikes associated with the action.

intimidate.description: Intimidate the channel, or a specific user.

params.user: User to intimidate. Leave empty to address the whole channel.
params.channel: Send the warning in the channel instead of a direct message.

strike.error: An error occurred, please try again. If the issue persists, please join the support server (link in `/help`).

get.title: Strikes for {name}
get.empty: No strikes found for this user.
get.file_notice: Strike list is too long to display inline, sending as a file:

remove.success: Strike with ID `{id}` for {mention} has been successfully removed.
remove.not_found:
No strike with ID `{id}` found for {mention} in this guild.
Use `/strikes get <user>` to display all strikes and their IDs.

intimidate.user_body:
{mention},
Your actions are pushing the limits of what is acceptable within this server. Consider this your final warning before a strike is issued against your account. Continued disregard for the community guidelines will result in immediate disciplinary action, which may include further penalties or removal from the server.

This is not a request — comply with the rules now.
intimidate.guild_body: Please be advised that Moderator Bot is actively monitoring all activity in this channel. Any violations of community guidelines may result in disciplinary action. The severity and nature of these actions will depend on the circumstances of each case. We appreciate your cooperation in helping maintain a respectful and safe environment.
